scripts.deploy: next build && touch out/.nojekyll && git add -f out/ && git commit -m "Deploy" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-deploy: touch out/.nojekyll && git add -f out/ && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix out/ origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-deploy-init: touch out/.nojekyll && git add -f out/ && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push origin && git subtree push --prefix out/ origin gh-pages
